lead_paragraph: The nine-time N.H.L. All-Star defenseman Brian Leetch, the United States Olympic gold and silver medalist Cammi Granato, the writer and broadcaster Stan Fischler, and the longtime communications executive John Halligan will be this year’s recipients of the Lester Patrick.
